title: How can I mirror/cast my pixel 2 xl to my Samsung smart TV without WiFi , cromocast or any cable
content:
I want to mirror my pixel 2 screen on TV .
I got two mobiles other one is Samsung s6 it's very easy to connect to tv with any extra thing just click the option and you are connected.
how can I connect my pixel to tv like I connect my Samsung .
I don't have wifi , cromocast or cable etc
